FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: SOS2 Support and updating Conflicting Textures
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: This is a hotfix to update SOS2 support and address conflicting textures.

patchNoteLines.li: SOS2 support has been updated.
Be advised, make sure Vehicle Framework is up to date as this point of time as it's spewing errors.
Some building textures were removed and replaced with placeholders whilst we work on new textures.

patchNoteImageDescriptions.li: Be advised, make sure Vehicle Framework is up to date as this point of time as it's spewing errors.

additionalNotes.li: Please raise any issues you find on the Github page.

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Building Menu Overhaul and Stability Fixes
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: Major improvements to the building menu system, expanded biome support, enhanced road functionality, and numerous critical bug fixes for improved stability.

patchNoteLines.li: Building menu has had an overhaul, You can now resize and filter buildings
Alpha biomes support - Pecha
Neolithic Buildings - Pecha
Roads should be working much better now
New roads provide an alert when built
Fixed infinite loop crash in tax system with safety checks. Fixed PawnGen errors upon delivery + Safe delivery location coordinate error.
Fixed a stack overflow error when opening the Create Settlement screen caused by infinite recursion in IsInAnyShuttleRange
Fixed PawnGenerationRequest "incorrect constructor" errors in FCPawnGenerator
Fixed Critical XML Definition Errors - Policy System Repair
Fixed version tracking and red outline display issues
Enhanced patch notes window visual design
Improved code stability and asset loading
Better user experience with branded default imagery

additionalNotes.li: Please raise any issues you find on the Github page.
